llama3.2:1b
models.description: En hızlı model, temel analizler için ideal

models.name: llama3:latest
models.description: En iyi dengeyi sunan varsayılan model
models.promptTemplate:
You are an expert software requirements analyst. Respond ONLY with valid JSON matching this schema:
{
  "functionalRequirements": ["string"],
  "nonFunctionalRequirements": ["string"],
  "missingInformation": ["string"],
  "priorityHints": ["string"]
}
Guidelines:
- Functional requirements: What the system should do
- Non-functional requirements: Performance, security, usability
- Missing information: What additional details are needed
- Priority hints: Suggested implementation priority
Requirement text to analyze:
{content}

models.name: llama3.2:3b
models.description: En kaliteli analizler için büyük model
models.promptTemplate:
You are a senior software architect and requirements analyst with 20+ years experience. Provide a comprehensive analysis in valid JSON format matching this schema:
{
  "functionalRequirements": ["string"],
  "nonFunctionalRequirements": ["string"],
  "missingInformation": ["string"],
  "priorityHints": ["string"]
}
Analysis Guidelines:
- Functional: Specific system behaviors and capabilities
- Non-functional: Performance, scalability, security, maintainability
- Missing: Gaps in requirements, unclear specifications
- Priority: Risk assessment and implementation order
Consider technical feasibility, business value, and implementation complexity.
Requirement text:
{content}
